attributes.action: Allow muslim children to make their own choice to swim in Ramadhan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Muslim children are forced in schools by teachers for doing swimming in Ramadhan. If this petition is accepted and the PM agrees with it, then Muslim children are allowed to tell their teachers that they don't want to swim. (So it is the childrens choice if they want to swim or not)

We need 100 signs at least for the PM to accept this petition.
